eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED A FIRE WARNING FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Chelan, WA; AT 08:58 PM ON SEP 25, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 09:58 PM. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text:
Chelan County Sheriff's Office has issued a Level 1 Fire Advisory for the Sunnyslope area.

The affected area is upper portion Sunnyslope to include West Eagle Rock, April Drive, May Lane and Upper Crest View.

Please monitor local radio stations and Chelan County Emergency Management Facebook or the Chelan County Incident Map for updates. You will be kept advised as conditions change.  Please monitor local radio stations and Chelan County Emergency Management Facebook for updates.
